entry.title: 50 measurement documents are displayed from IE02/IE03
entry.content:
Hi Team,

When displaying measurement documents from IE02/IE03 the result list displays only 50 documents. Can you please help me on why it is restricting to latest 50 documents.

Note: we have removed the no of measurement documents criteria  of 50 in IK17 and IK18

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: EAM: F6065 : Features Send Output/Output status are greyed out
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Features like Send Output, Retry Output and Output status are greyed out in the FIORI App F6065 i.e. Manage Work Packs" 

As per the SAP Note 3390116, we need to activate PM Object "OPD_EAM_MAINT_JOB_PACKAGE" in BRFPLUS table however SAP Note 2248229 does not include the XML for "OPD_EAM_MAINT_JOB_PACKAGE"

The issue is for the SAPCore 108 Release. I request you to advise the next steps.

Thanks in advance for your support.

Pavan Pilli

SAP EAM Consultant

Only 50 measurement documents are displayed from equipment IE02/IE03. Is this standard? Is there a way to remove the restriction from 50 via IE02/IE03. We have removed the restriction in IK17/Ik18.

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: Starting My SAP Journey as a Real Estate Specialist (Immobilienkaufmann)
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm just about to begin my apprenticeship as an Immobilienkaufmann (Real Estate Specialist) and I'm very eager to start learning SAP alongside my training. My goal is to become an expert in the field of real estate management using SAP, and I'm looking for a solid roadmap.

I would be grateful for any insights and advice you could share. I have a few fundamental questions:

Given my focus as an Immobilienkaufmann, which SAP modules should I prioritize learning first? (For example, FI, RE-FX, or Asset Management)

What is the best learning path for a complete beginner who wants to specialize in this area?

Are there any specific free courses or resources on the SAP Learning website that you would highly recommend for this career path?

Any personal experiences, tips, or professional advice would be incredibly valuable to me.

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: F5104A: Unable to update measurement readings
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I am currently testing a new scope of fiori apps. Among them: F5104A "Perform maintenance job", with no phase model activated.

While the app shows information accordingly, I am having issues with measurement readings.

For a certain operation 

I indicate the measurement reading amount

Calculation for reading difference executes accordingly, then I click on save

No changes whatsoever

When checking "All readings", no measurement readings added (those previous readings were added through GUI, working accordingly)

Is there any implementation config I am missing? Any SAP Note I could apply? (I've been searching and no success)

Your help will be highly appreaciated

Thanks in advance,

Sebasti√°n

entry.title: Unable to get the Job packs created when "create work packs" is initiated from the FIORI App "Find M
entry.content:
Hi Experts, 

I have set up Output Management in EAM S4CORE 108 by activating the EAM Objects "Maintenance Orders" and "Maintenance Notifications" in Cross Application node in SPRO. Please note that i dont see Object for "Maintenance Job Packages".

With reference to OSS Notes 2248229 and 3390116 , i could get the XML imported into the system however Maintenance Job packages is not updated in the "Cross Application component" under SPRO.

OPD is having 3 EAM Objects reflecting in it. I have configured OPD for Maintenance order for all business rules as per the SAP Guide however i am not able to trigger the Output from "Create Work packs" or "Print" option in the "Find Maintenance orders" App. I am seeing the status of the output as "Partially Failed" in in Manage Work packs.

2nd issue is , I made config changes to include the Document types YP01 and YP02 for attaching the files. When i am trying to import the changes to testing client, i am getting error with BRF+ table inactive objects but in actual, 3 of EAM Objects are active with green lights.

Please advise on possible reason for the failure of Send output. 

Thanks in advance.

Pavan Pilli

entry.title: How to use Standard Que time in work center for maintenance order operation scheduling.
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Need your inputs and suggestions on how to achieve the scheduling of maintenance order operation with Standard que time field value within the work center master scheduling tab.

Example:

We have work center "Mechanical", in scheduling tab we have field Std Que time value filled with 2HR.

We have work center "Electrical", in scheduling tab we have field Std Que time value filled with 3HR.

and now we have order with several operations with the above work centers.

In general the scheduling will happen as below.

Mechanical - Operations 1 - 5Hrs - start time 08:00:00 end time 13:00:00

Mechanical - Operations 2 - 2Hrs - start time 13:00:00 end time 15:00:00

Electrical - Operations 3 - 1Hrs - start time 15:00:00 end time 16:00:00

 

Now requirement is like below

Mechanical - Operations 1 - 5Hrs - start time 08:00:00 end time 13:00:00  + 2HR Que time

Mechanical - Operations 2 - 2Hrs - start time 15:00:00 end time 17:00:00  + 2HR Que time

Electrical - Operations 3 - 1Hrs - start time 19:00:00 end time 20:00:00

que time should be considered for each operation, even if the work center for next operation is changed then the que time of that work center should be considered.

The request is for they wanted a que time for transfer of that equipment from one work center to another work center. So operation cannot be started immediately after the completion of first operation.

Please provide your thoughts to achieve this requirement.

entry.title: Multiple Counter Performance-Based Maintenance Plan Migration
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I have a requirement to create a multiple-counter performance-based maintenance plan in S/4HANA.

  • While checking the LTMC / Migration Cockpit templates, I could not find a specific template that supports multiple counters with AND/OR logic.

  • Is there any standard template available for this scenario?

  • If not, can this be achieved via LSMW or by enhancing the object in LTMOM?

  • In case it is not currently supported in migration cockpit templates, does SAP have any plan/timeline to deliver this functionality?

Any guidance or feedback will be highly appreciated.

Regards,

Sriram

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: Enable DIR documents from referenco objects in maintance order Fiori applications
entry.content:
Greetings,

we are wondering if it possible ti display DIR documents in maintenance order Fiori applications. These documents are assigned:

  • at equipment level
  • at functional location level

Fiori applications in question:

  • manage maintenance notifications and orders
  • find maintence orders

We are aware of possibility to display the documents in "Process maintenance order" app and the functionality described in note 3392917. Unfortunately this is only applicable in limited set of scenarios and does not solve our initial problem,

This functionality is available in standard in GUI transactions and it provides a nice shortcut to documents related to maintenance of technical objects. This is relevant for proactive and reactive maintenance.

Best regards, M,

entry.title: SAP Fiori F5104A tab "Measuerments" Latest Reading / Measurement Points are not visible
entry.content:
Hello Experts, 

i have an issue with the Fiori App F5104A and the tab measurments. I select a Technical Object (FL) and the table below measurement points has no entries. When i click on "All Readings" the measurement Point is shown and the documents for this measurment point.

I createad a measurement document with the same user via IK11 for the measurement point and it works. 

I have searched SAP notes, but i cannot find this issue. Do i have to change some settings in the SPRO? (I found, the issue, that the all readings tab is empty, but my issue is that only the latest reading tab is emtpy...)

 

 

I am grateful for any advice.

Kind regards

Jens

 

SAP: 2022 FPS02 

 

 

Edit / Solution: 

SAP Notes  358047 and 3580763 describe not the exact issue, but after implementing it is solved.

entry.title: Business requirement to copy SME Evaluation Questionnaire comments into implementation task
entry.content:
We have a business requirement to make comments from the SME reviews transfer to the task they create. Business reports that there is a lot of good information and clear instructions being missed because comments are not readily visible in change execution tasks.      

--- Steps to Reproduce ---

  1. Create New MOC Change Request.
  2. MOC CR is created and MOC Activities are also generated by system.
  3. Once the Initial Evaluation Activities are completed SME Evaluation Activities are populated.
  4. Under SME Evaluation Activities there are mandatory questionnaire to be answered with Comments as optional. If the users provide some information or add valuation information to be considered while completing the implementation of MOC. The Comments added during SME Evaluation should get copied to the implementation Activities Notes Section.

  5. MOC evaluation dependent implementation tasks are added to MOC Issue according to BRF+ decision table DECISION_TABLE_ACTIVITIES_2_C. MOC calls BRF+ processing at the system status transition from APPROVE to IN-PROCESS in this situation.

    The requirement is to copy comments from triggering question into Note section of resulting implementation tasks.

     

    API is available to read BRF+ decision table.

entry.title: How to upload an image to the equipments fiori APP
entry.content:

We have implemented the AM module for Plant Maintenance and created several pieces of equipment. When we search for the equipment using the Fiori app ‚ÄúFind Technical Object,‚Äù we notice that there is a field for the equipment image. However, so far we haven‚Äôt been able to assign an image to this field:

What configuration or steps are required to display the equipment image in this Fiori application? The technical objects already have attachments:

Does the image need to be uploaded as a specific attachment type, or does it require a different file extension (other than PNG or JPG)?

Thank you in advance for your help.

Best regards,
David

entry.title: API Call API_MAINTAINANCEORDER ends with HTTP RC 423 and message "Billable Order 4001380 is not sup
entry.content:
In SAP Note 3330419 (3330419 - Release-Informationen und -Einschr√§nkungen in Bezug auf SAP S/4HANA Service - SAP for Me )  is described that for if you flag a maintenance order as billable 

is described that ar least with S/4HANA Service 2023 FPS3 it is not possible to create or change a billable flagged maintainance order via API.

Are they any plans in the SAP roadmap to enhance the API to make it possible ?

entry.title: LSMW issue in IE02 transaction
entry.content:
Hi,

I am facing an issue while using LSMW for IE02 transaction. I tried using batch input recording but upon saving, the record does not get updated. I also imported a working LSMW project from another system and upon running the whole cycle of file uploading till batch input processing, I receive no errors and it shows it is successful. However, upon opening the equipment, I realize that no change has been done in the equipment. Data is not being update via LSMW in IE02 transaction, however I am able to change data manually.
